description:
In order to do "follow-up reports" on Junta, Karin`s back from the future, and she`s out to have a blast! Junta and Ryuji seem to be doing fine, and their DNA is returning to normal. But it seems there`s another actor on this stage, and he`s arriving from the future, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もう一つのタイムマシン
